text:
How to use the
Eisenhower Matrix?
Prioritizing tasks by urgency and importance results in 4
quadrants with different work strategies:
1) Do First
First focus
on important tasks
to be done the same day.
2 Schedule
Important, but
not-so-urgent stuff
should be scheduled.
Delegate
What's urgent,
but less important,
delegate to others.
4 Don't Do
What's neither urgent
nor important,
don't do at all.
